#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>

#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>

#define in(i) scanf("%d",&i);

using namespace std;

int count(int n,int k){
  int sc;
  sc=(n/(k+1))*k;
  n=n-sc;
  int i=1;
  while(i<k){
    if(sc+i>(n-i)*k)
      break;
    i++;
  }
  i--;
  sc=sc+i;
  return sc;
}

int main(){
  int tc,n,m,w,c,sm,sw,sc,left,i;
  in(tc);
  
  while(tc--){
    in(n);
    in(m);
    in(w);
    in(c);
    
    sc=min(c,min(count(n,4),(m+min(w,m*2))*4));
    n=n-sc;
    
    sw=min(w,min(count(n,2),m*2));
    n=n-sw;
    
    sm=min(m,n);
    
    printf("%d %d %d\n",sm,sw,sc);
  }
  return 0;
}
